content: This subsection allows you to provide users with secure and convenient ways to access the portal.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the subtitle displayed next to a button or similar element that allows users to access the secure portal. It provides a brief description of the functionality offered by this section, helping users understand its purpose in the portal settings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'secure and convenient ways' isn't perfectly captured. While 'آمنة ومريحة' (aminah wa murihah) translates to 'secure and comfortable/convenient,' it doesn't fully convey the intended nuance of 'convenient access.' A more accurate phrasing would emphasize ease of access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: هذا القسم الفرعي يسمح لك بتزويد المستخدمين بطرق آمنة وسهلة للوصول إلى البوابة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation uses a full stop (period) at the end of the sentence, which is grammatically correct but could be omitted depending on the overall style guide for the portal. Consider the consistency with other titles/descriptions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: هذا القسم الفرعي يسمح لك بتزويد المستخدمين بطرق آمنة ومريحة للوصول إلى البوابة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "provide users with" is not accurately translated. "Տրամադրել" (tramadel) can imply a more formal or less direct provision than intended. A more natural phrasing would convey the idea of *offering* or *enabling* users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "տրամադրել" with a more appropriate verb like "ապահովել" (apahovel - to ensure/provide) or rewording the sentence to better reflect 'offering' access.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels slightly rigid. It might benefit from a slight rephrasing to read more naturally in Armenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence for better flow. For example, something like: "Այս ենթաբաժինը ապահովում է օգտվողների համար պորտալ մուտք գործելու անվտանգ և հարմար եղանակներ:" (This subsection provides safe and convenient ways for users to access the portal.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ພາກສ່ວນຍ່ອຍນີ້ຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ທ່ານສາມາດໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ມີວິທີທີ່ປອດໄພແລະສະດວກໃນການເຂົ້າເຖິງປະຕູ" doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'portal'. 'ປະຕູ' translates to 'door', which is not the intended meaning. It's referring to a digital portal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ພາກສ່ວນຍ່ອຍນີ້ຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ທ່ານສາມາດໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ມີວິທີທີ່ປອດໄພແລະສະດວກໃນການເຂົ້າເຖິງເວັບໄຊທ໌ ຫຼື ປະຕູຂໍ້ມູນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow and naturalness in Lao. The repeated use of 'ມີ' (to have) makes it sound clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ພາກສ່ວນຍ່ອຍນີ້ຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ທ່ານສາມາດສ້າງວິທີການເຂົ້າເຖິງປະຕູຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ປອດໄພແລະສະດວກສຳລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "nodrošināt drošus un ērtus veidus" (to ensure safe and convenient ways) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "provide users with secure and convenient ways". It implies the users are doing the providing, which is incorrect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Šī apakšsadaļa ļauj nodrošināt lietotājiem drošus un ērtus veidus, kā piekļūt portālam.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Esta subseção permite fornecer aos usuários maneiras seguras e convenientes de acessar o portal' is grammatically correct but not the most natural way to express the English meaning. A more idiomatic translation would convey the idea of *allowing* users to *have* secure and convenient access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Esta subseção permite que os usuários tenham maneiras seguras e convenientes de acessar o portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'permite fornecer' is somewhat awkward. 'Permite' can mean 'allows,' but 'fornecer' (to provide) is redundant since 'allows' already implies providing. A more natural phrasing would be 'permite que os usuários'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Esta subseção permite que os usuários maneiras seguras e convenientes de acessar o portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Această subsecțiune vă permite să le oferă utilizatorilor accesul sigur și convenabil la portal' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'This subsection allows you to provide users with secure and convenient ways to access the portal.' The reflexive pronoun 'le' is unnecessary and makes the sentence sound awkward. 'Oferă' can be replaced with a more appropriate verb.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Această subsecțiune vă permite să oferiți utilizatorilor modalități sigure și convenabile de a accesa portalul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks the plural form of 'ways', which is important to convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Această subsecțiune vă permite să oferiți utilizatorilor modalități sigure și convenabile de a accesa portalul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ආරක්‍ෂිත සහ පහසු ක්‍රම" (arakshitha saha pahasu krama) translates to 'secure and convenient methods' which is a literal translation but doesn't flow as naturally in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing might emphasize 'safe and easy' ways.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම අනුකොටස පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට ද්වාරය වෙත ප්‍රවේශ වීමට ආරක්ෂිත හා පහසුවන ක්‍රම ලබා දීමට ඉඩ සලසයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'හා' (ha) instead of 'සහ' (saha) after 'ආරක්‍ෂිත' sounds more natural and is generally preferred in modern Sinhala usage for conjunctions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change necessary, but consider 'හා' for a slightly more modern feel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "This subsection" as "Tiểu mục này" is technically correct but a little stiff and formal. It might be more natural to use something like "Phần này" or "Mục này".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mục này cho phép bạn cung cấp cho người dùng những cách an toàn và thuận tiện để truy cập cổng thông tin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "cổng thông tin" is a valid translation of "portal", in this context, "khu vực" or “nền tảng” might be more appropriate depending on the specific portal being described.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mục này cho phép bạn cung cấp cho người dùng những cách an toàn và thuận tiện để truy cập khu vực/nền tảng.
